info.title: OERMS Result Service API
info.description: API documentation for Exam Result Management Service

post.description: Publishes a result to make it visible to the student
Manually grades a result (for subjective questions)
Send result notifications to all students
Calculates rankings for all published results in an exam

get.description: Retrieves all results with pagination and filtering
Retrieves a single result (students can only see published results)
Analysis of time management
Analysis of strong and weak areas
Detailed analysis of each question
Get percentile ranking in exam
AI-generated insights and recommendations
Retrieves detailed result including questions and answers
Compare result with class performance
Retrieves all results with suspicious activity

get.summary: Get student performance trend over time
get.description: Retrieves performance trend for a student
Retrieves statistics for a specific student
Retrieves all results with a specific status
Search results with multiple filter criteria
Retrieves recent results based on activity type
Retrieves all results requiring manual grading
Performance breakdown by subject
Retrieves statistics for the current student
Retrieves all published results for the current student
Retrieves student's results for a specific exam
Compare multiple results side-by-side
Track performance improvement
Identify areas needing improvement
Check if result service is running
Retrieves all results for a specific exam
Retrieves top scorers for an exam
Retrieves suspicious results for a specific exam

get.summary: Get specific student's results for an exam
get.description: Retrieves a student's results for a specific exam
Retrieves detailed statistics for an exam

get.summary: Get publication status summary for exam
get.description: Retrieves count of published vs unpublished results
Retrieves results requiring grading for a specific exam
Retrieves low-performing students for intervention
Retrieves grade distribution for an exam
Retrieves results submitted within a date range
Retrieves multiple results by their IDs
Retrieves a single result by attempt ID

Bearer Authentication.description: Enter JWT token obtained from auth-server
